entry.title: Monday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning early this morning then changing to a few rain showers near noon and ending this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon then becoming west 20 late this afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Monday 10 April 2023
